import {useState} from 'react' import styles from '../styling/form.module.css' function Signup(){ const[email, setEmail] = useState() const[password, setPassword] = useState() const[userName, setUserName] = useState() return(
setEmail(e.target.value)} value={email} required>
setUserName(e.target.value)} value={userName} required>
) } export default Signup
